thread.title: Justin Timberlake Gives Empowering Speech About 'Being Different' at iHeartRadio 2017

author: Just Jared
title: Justin Timberlake Gives Empowering Speech About 'Being Different' at iHeartRadio 2017
text:
Justin Timberlake just won the Song of the Year award for ‚ÄúCan‚Äôt Stop the Feeling‚Äù at the 2017 iHeartRadio Music Awards on Sunday (March 5) at The Forum in Inglewood, Calif, which was handed to him by Jeremy Renner .
‚ÄúI wrote this song because I wanted it to be about inclusion, about‚Ä¶ being together. (I want to) speak to young people right now, ‚Äôcause there‚Äôs a lot of you looking at me, if you are black or you are brown or you are gay or you are lesbian or you are trans, or maybe you‚Äôre just a sissy singing boy from Tennessee‚Ä¶anyone that is treating you unkindly, it‚Äôs only because they are afraid, or they have been taught to be afraid of how important you are. Because being different means you make the difference,‚Äù Justin said on stage while accepting the prize.
Watch below‚Ä¶
